A4.text: The platypus is a semiaquatic, eggâ€‘laying mammal.

A5.text: Together with the four species of echidna, it is one of the five extant species of monotremes, mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth to live young.

A6.text: Echidnas are Australian egg-laying mammals also known as spiny anteaters.
